voice.name: en-US-JaneNeural
voice.mstts:express-as: Good morning, Contoso restaurant. I am your AI assistant, Jane. How can I help you?

voice.name: en-US-TonyNeural
voice.mstts:express-as: Hi, I would like to make a dinner reservation.

voice.name: en-US-JaneNeural
voice.mstts:express-as: Of course, what evening will you be joining us on?

speak.voice: We will need the reservation for Thursday night.

mstts:express-as.prosody: And what time would you like the reservation for?

voice.name: en-US-JaneNeural
voice.mstts:express-as: Fine, I can seat you at 7:00 on Thursday, if you would kindly give me your name.

voice.name: en-US-TonyNeural
voice.mstts:express-as: The last name is Wood. W-O-O-D, Wood.

voice.name: en-US-JaneNeural
voice.mstts:express-as: See you at 7:00 this Thursday, Mr. Wood.
